description_html:
A bold, industrial statement. We crafted this edgy collection around a solid steel i-beam (or two) wrapped with solid pine to complement the distinct shape. Instantly eye-catching. Deserving of all the compliments you’ll receive.

How It Is Make It
Artisan-crafted with solid pine and treated with natural matte protective finish
8" steel I-Beam is finished in distressed black
Back and seat cushions are constructed with a highly resilient foam core that is blanket wrapped in a feather-down and fiber blend
Expect slight natural variation in the wood and steel

Details & Dimensions
Overall Dimensions: 23.5"H x 36“ W x 33.5"D
Seat Cushion: 8"H x 28"W x 29"D
